qacOutliers 0.0.0.9000

    Multivariate Outlier Detection

    multiOutliers.Rd

    Identifies multivariate outliers using four different methods.

    multiOutliers(
  data,
  varlist = names(data),
  method,
  minPts = 5,
  k = 5,
  threshold = 0.95,
  na.rm = TRUE,
  ...
)

    Arguments

    data

    a data frame

    varlist

    a list of numeric variables

    method

    character, supplies the method to be used for outlier detection. Methods are LoF, kNN, mahalanobis, and iForest

    minPts

    (optional) numeric, minimum points used for LoF outlier detection. Default value is 5

    k

    (optional) a k value used for the kNN method of outlier detection. Default value is 5

    threshold

    (optional) the threshold used for kNN outlier detection. Default value is 0.95

    Value

    indices of detected outliers, if any

    Examples

    data(mtcars)
multiOutliers(mtcars, method="mahalanobis")
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'dplyr'
#> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':

multiOutliers(mtcars, method="LoF")
